Basic Cola.name: Basic Cola
Basic Cola.desc: Mhhhh! Soda made from Icoberry leaf extract! This heals 15 HP of calories and sugars.

Green Potion.name: Green Potion
Green Potion.desc: Despite it smelling kinda like grass, it's a good way to heal! By either drinking it or **SLAPPING** it on the wound.

Wood.name: Wood
Wood.desc: Just ordinary wood used for virtually everything in the world.
